Description:
The story is told in Resident Evil Revelations 2, episode continues the original Resident Evil Revelations. Originally RER 2 will be coming out every week as a separate series for download, since 24 February 2015 Players will also be able to purchase a full season or a boxed version. Thus, fans will receive each episode as they become available, together with additional material. Each episode in the Resident Evil Revelations 2 includes content mode "Raid", as well as two fully ready to play scenarios that are dedicated to the heroes of the previously announced Claire and Moira and recently confirmed storyline Barry and Natalie.
Features:
Return of the genre survival horror - Brand new story in the saga Resident Evil Revelations comes in the form of weekly episodes to download.
Plunge into the most terrifying adventure of the year - each episode - a few hours of chilling adventure every time terminating the most interesting place, forcing players to look forward to the next turn of this exciting thriller.
Starring Claire Redfield and Moira Burton - the favorite of public Clare will meet again with his nightmares from the past along with Moira Burton, daughter of legendary Resident Evil Barry Burton.
Barry is back! - A crowd favorite and veteran STARS Barry Burton back in the game! He searches for missing daughter trapped on a remote island-prison.
Evil is watching - Prison on a remote island only looks abandoned and uninhabited - in fact horrors await players around every corner. Is it possible to escape from here?
New types of enemies - Rotten, which shine through the body of the bone will stop at nothing in their hunt for a living, and awful Revenant made of stitched together pieces of human bodies.
Based on mutual multiplayer mode - Players will need to switch between the two characters (Claire / Moira Barry / Natalya) to defeat the monstrous creatures either in single player mode with a partner-AI, or in multiplayer mode offline.
Powerful mode "Raid" - In addition to the well-developed narrative mode, and returns Mode "Raid" with spectacular tense battles for one or two players (for online and offline). The updated and enhanced mode "Raid" contains 15 characters and more than 200 steps, as well as a variety of new materials, new stages of the previously released games RE, better-designed mechanical transmission, additional difficulty levels, new weapons and parts, and four times as many skills characters than it was in the Revs 1.
Features RePack:
Partially cut all localization except Russian and English.
Do not cut / no recoded.
Unlock all released DLC.
List of unlocked DLC:
- Claire's Rodeo Costume 
- Moira's Urban Ninja Costume 
- Natalia's Lottie Suit Costume 
- Barry's Commandant Costume 
- Costume pack 
- Raid Mode Character: HUNK 
- Raid Mode Character: Albert Wesker 
- Raid Mode: Throwback Map Pack 
- Raid Mode: A Weapon Storage

- Raid Mode: Weapon Storage C
